short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Audit sitemaps to analyze URLs and structure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sitemap Audit is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to effortlessly analyze and audit sitemaps to ensure your website's structure is optimized. Whether you're an SEO professional, a developer, or a content manager, this tool makes it easy to inspect sitemaps and verify that your site's URLs are accessible and well-organized.

The extension comes with several useful features. It can parse and display sitemaps, including nested sitemaps, and count the total number of URLs in each. You can also view example URLs directly from your sitemap with just a click. Sitemap Audit automatically detects and pre-fills the sitemap URL for the website you're currently on, saving you time. The intuitive and clean user interface ensures a seamless experience.

Using Sitemap Audit is simple. Open the extension while browsing any website, and it will automatically fetch and display the sitemap URL. You can also input a custom URL if needed. Analyze sitemaps and review the results in seconds, including a summary of sitemaps, URLs, and clickable examples.

This extension is the perfect companion for optimizing your website's SEO strategy and ensuring your content is discoverable. Download Sitemap Audit today and take control of your website's structure!
